mapper.sql: FRONT_STAGE_ID frontStageId, STAGE_ID stageId, HIST_STAGE_ID histStageId, SORT_NO sortNo, IS_ACTIVE isActive, FRONT_STAGE_MEMO frontStageMemo, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId

${alias}.FRONT_STAGE_ID frontStageId, ${alias}.STAGE_ID stageId, ${alias}.HIST_STAGE_ID histStageId, ${alias}.SORT_NO sortNo, ${alias}.IS_ACTIVE isActive, ${alias}.FRONT_STAGE_MEMO frontStageMemo, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.update:
update AEA_PAR_FRONT_STAGE
FRONT_STAGE_ID = #{frontStageId},
STAGE_ID = #{stageId},
HIST_STAGE_ID = #{histStageId},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive},
FRONT_STAGE_MEMO = #{frontStageMemo},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where FRONT_STAGE_ID = #{frontStageId}
mapper.select:
select max(SORT_NO) from AEA_PAR_FRONT_STAGE
and STAGE_ID = #{stageId}

select
,aps.STAGE_NAME histStageName from AEA_PAR_FRONT_STAGE apfs left join aea_par_stage aps on aps.STAGE_ID = apfs.HIST_STAGE_ID where apfs.FRONT_STAGE_ID = #{id}
